feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Managed vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 8, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 11, 16:00 UTC

Sep 4, 11:14 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Sep 3, 21:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 08/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation, vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.

An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.
Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 8, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 11, 16:00 UTC

Sep 3, 20:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 08/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation. If the host has virtual machines, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [RBX2c][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Rack R806L25 incident notification.
entry.content:
Sep 1, 13:59 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 01/09/2025 11:57 UTC
End time : 01/09/2025 13:58 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by the ongoing maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/6g0fg6njp479

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Sep 1, 12:17 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in the specific rack R806L25.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 01/09/2025 11:57 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable in this specific rack.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot acces their hosts in this specific rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by the ongoing maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/6g0fg6njp479
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.
